name: Out of (Pest) Control
description:
Welcome to Out of (Pest) Control

Play as a pesky little critter trying to get as much fruit as they can. Wait for fruit trees to drop apples, oranges, pears, and more! But watch out - if the farmers catch you - they won't be happy!Although the farmers are faster than you if they see you, jump, crouch, and sprint to avoid detection.
